home.title: Find Your Perfect Dining Companion
home.description: FanYueShe is a social dining app that helps you find like-minded dining companions to enjoy delicious food together. Supports instant dining, scheduled meals, and group dining.

discover.title: Discover Nearby Dining Events
discover.description: Discover exciting dining events near you, find like-minded dining companions, and enjoy the perfect combination of food and socializing.

createDinner.title: Create Dining Event
createDinner.description: Easily create your dining event and invite like-minded friends to enjoy delicious food together.
createDinner.keywords: create dining event,organize meal,invite friends,social dining

dinnerDetail.title: Dining Event Details
dinnerDetail.description: View detailed dining event information, understand activity arrangements, and interact with dining companions.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.description: View user profiles, learn about dining companions, and establish social dining connections.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about FanYueShe's mission and vision. We are committed to creating the highest quality social dining platform.

foodGuide.title: Food Guide - Cuisine Features and Restaurant Recommendations
foodGuide.description: Explore Sichuan, Cantonese, Japanese cuisine features, discover the best dining locations, get professional social dining advice.
foodGuide.keywords: food guide,cuisine introduction,restaurant recommendations,Sichuan cuisine,Cantonese cuisine,Japanese cuisine,dining strategy

faq.title: FAQ - FanYueShe Usage Guide
faq.description: FanYueShe frequently asked questions, including registration, creating dinners, safety guidelines, chat features and detailed instructions.

beijing.title: Beijing Food Social Guide - Find Beijing Dining Companions
beijing.description: Discover the best dining gathering places in Beijing, explore Beijing food culture with like-minded friends.
beijing.keywords: Beijing food,Beijing dining,Beijing dining companions,social dining
